visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart displaying the NASA Budget as a percentage of the Federal Budget over the years. The chart should have a title 'NASA Budget as a % of Fed Budget', with the x-axis labeled 'Year' and the y-axis labeled '% of Fed Budget'. The data series should start from the year 1958 and display the percentage values provided. The chart should have a zooming feature, and the legend should be disabled.

title.text: NASA Budget as a % of Fed Budget

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart that visualizes the NASA Budget as a percentage of the Federal Budget from the year 1958 onwards. The chart includes a title and subtitle, with the x-axis labeled 'Year' and the y-axis labeled '% of Fed Budget'. The data series is formatted to start from 1958 and includes the percentage values for each year. The chart also features a zooming capability, allowing users to zoom in on specific areas of the chart. Additionally, the legend is disabled, and the markers for the data points are turned off to provide a cleaner visual appearance. The tooltip for each data point displays the percentage value with a '%' suffix.
